title: EstrellaYoshte's 8kon Artworks
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:monotypical]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --page-content-width: 75rem;

    --linkColor: #88C0D0;
 
    --primaryBackgroundColor: #fcfdff;
    --secondaryBackgroundColor: #E5E9F0;
    --tertiaryBackgroundColor: #D8DEE9;
    --borderColor: #acbad6;
 
    --shadow: rgba(46,52,64,0.25);
 
    --selectionColor: #EBCB8B;
    --textColor: #2E3440;
    --textColor-alt: #434C5E;
}
#side-bar,#license-area,#footer-bar {
    --secondaryBackgroundColor: #2E3440;
    --tertiaryBackgroundColor: #434C5E;
    --textColor: #D8DEE9;
}

.image-grid {
    display: grid;
    margin-block: 1rem;
    gap: 1rem;
    place-items: center;
}
.image-grid img {
    border-radius: var(--radius-adjust);
    display: block;
    box-shadow: 0 0 .5rem .05rem var(--shadow);
    max-height: calc(100svh + 12.5rem);
}

.image-grid a { background:unset!important; border: none!important; }
[[/module]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
EstrellaYoshte's 8kon Artworks
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]
